description: Amendments to planning permission dated 11th October 2017 (RN: 17/05355/FULL) for, 'Erection of part single / part two-storey roof extension and erection of three-storey roof extension to rear central wing in order to provide an additional 42 bedrooms (Class C1) and erection of single storey side extension to provide extension to hotel (Class C1) facilities. Creation of new retail kiosk (Class A1) at ground floor level at corner of Portman Square and Upper Berkeley Street. Alterations to rear, front and side elevations'; NAMELY: (i) To make amendments to Conditions 8, 9, 11 and 22 to allow for the delivery of the enlarged loading bay (and associated enlarge waste store), delivery of the basement cycle parking provision and Servicing Management Strategy prior to the occupation of the works associated with the roof extension, rather than prior to occupation of any of the approved additional hotel floorspace; and (ii) To make amendments to Condition 20 so that adherence to the Car Parking Management Plan is upon commencement of the works to enlarge the loading bay rather than prior to occupation of any of the approved additional hotel floorspace.
